title: Define civil society and relate to democracy

content.question: Define civil society. Explain one way in which civil society can strengthen democracy. Explain why democracies restrict civil society.

frqParts.text: Define civil society. Explain one way in which civil society can strengthen democracy. Explain why democracies restrict civil society.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
